mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS (name, tel, email, gender, nick_name, login_id, password) VALUES (#{name}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{nickName}, #{loginId}, #{password})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERS SET status = 'DELETED' WHERE id = #{id} AND status != 'DELETED'
UPDATE MEMBERS SET password = #{password}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
